title: [ISSUE #5779]RocketMQ compaction topic support tombstone messages
body:
Changelog :

1. Modify the client. When the key is not empty, it will not be checked whether the body is empty; Support adding messages with empty body client , keybodycompact topic
2.  Add the delete.deletion.ms attribute when creating a topic; Empty messages will not be cleared directly during the compression process. Only when the configured timeout is reached will they be cleared during the compression process; If the compression process is cleared directly, the consumer may not consume and the client cache cannot be updatedtopicdelete.deletion.ms 
 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6446530/222106076-cce2ea11-6fda-4cfa-b954-f31dc43dd220.png)
3.When incremental compact is performed, even if the incremental file is empty, the compact operation will continue. In order to clear the expired empty message  compactioncompactbody null

title: [ISSUE #6215]Make benchmark cover compress msg situation
body:
closes #6215 

We could use benchmark like this to compress message body which is larger than 2 KB with "ZSTD" compress algorithm:
```sh producer.sh -n namesrv -t topic -c true -ct ZSTD -cl 5 -ch 2048```
